Package exe.bbllw8.demiurge.either

This package provides the Either type.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Either<A,B>
    Represents a value of 1 of 2 possible types (disjoint union).
    Left<A,B>
    The left side of the disjoint union, as opposed to the Right side.
    LeftProjection<A,B>
    Projects an Either into a Left.
    Right<A,B>
    The right side of the disjoint union, as opposed to the Left side.

Package exe.bbllw8.demiurge.either Description

This package provides the Either type.

Either is a type that represents a value of one of two possible types (disjoint union). An instance of Either is an instance of either Left or Right.

Since:
1.0.0
